title: Neuroethics
description: This course considers the implications of neuroscience research on culture, society, the legal system, and on how individuals conceive of their nature as human beings.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHIL 2010 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
